metadata.name: Dawn
metadata.description:
Neurography explores new dimensions of human capabilities at the interface between Brain, Computer, and Art. Combining technologies ranging from EEG hardware to software and AI, the project will push the limits of human creativity by generating art from brainwaves.

Neurography, which is generated from human brainwaves, is a completely new form of photograph that directly captures our psychological activities.The pattern dynamics is in accordance with the actual brain activity, and the heatmap image of the brain in the background reflects activity localization.We are standing right before the dawn of a new culture; capturing the precious moments of human psyche and leaving them forever.

This very first collection of Neurography was generated from the brainwave when the subject was listening to his favorite music. Brainwaves describe higher-level information about the human being itself, beyond sight, sound, and haptic sense. From this art, you might be able to feel emotions that only
